author: cole.vt
title: Proposal Framework Tool - AIM
description: Creating robust Catalyst proposals should be easier. +75% proposals don't win Catalyst funds costing assessors + proposers time + resources.
solution: Include an additional framework to the Proposer Tool, giving proposers a menu of goals + metrics ready for use in proposals.
experience: AIM members behind the voter-tool, CA-tool, vCA-Tool, Proposer Tool (SDG), Sustainable ADA, Cardano 4 Climate, developers, educators
